Function reference

Create flextable

flextable object

  • flextable
  • print.flextable

Headers

Add or modify flextable`s headers

Add a row of labels in headers

  • add_header

Set flextable's header rows

  • set_header_df

Set flextable's headers labels

  • set_header_labels

Manage flextable layout

Adjusts cell widths and heights

  • autofit

Calculate pretty dimensions

  • dim_pretty

Get flextable dimensions

  • dim.flextable

Set flextable rows height

  • height

Merge flextable cells horizontally

  • merge_h

Delete flextable merging informations

  • merge_none

Merge flextable cells vertically

  • merge_v

Set flextable columns width

  • width

Modify flextable`s formatting properties, apply theme functions.

  • bg

bold font

  • bold

Set borders

  • border

Set font color

  • color

make blank columns as transparent

  • empty_blanks

Set paddings

  • padding

Set flextable style

  • style

Apply booktabs theme

  • theme_booktabs

Apply tron legacy theme

  • theme_tron_legacy

Apply tron theme

  • theme_tron

Apply vanilla theme

  • theme_vanilla

Apply zebra theme

  • theme_zebra
